item.title: Articles I found helpful as a junior dev
item.description: Here are five articles I really liked reading as a junior developer. I’ve learned the most by doing things at work, but these articles filled in some gaps for me and helped me build a better, more confident mental model for being an “effective engineer”. 1. The Thirty Minute Rule When it comes to coding (or anything related to it) there’s a rule I believe in with all my heart .
